Package io.github.frc5024.lib5k.control_loops

Class ExtendedPIDController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.controller.PIDController
      • io.github.frc5024.lib5k.control_loops.ExtendedPIDController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sendable, Controller, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    public class ExtendedPIDController
extends PIDController
implements Controller
    ExtendedPIDController is an extension of WPILib's PIDController that adds a few quality-of-life features

        Kp - P gain
        Ki - I gain
        Kd - D gain
        FF - Feed Forward value
        restTimeSeconds - Amount of time the system must be stable for to be considered "truly stable"
